body: The eidolon looks like a multi-headed hydra. This model creates a five-headed hydra. A cryohydra or pyrohydra can be created by adding the breath weapon and immunity evolutions, resulting in a 26-point model.
name: Hydra

sections.body: Base Form serpentine; Primary Evolutions bite, head; Secondary Evolutions bite (3), fast healing, head (3), large.
sections.name: 20 points
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Eidolon Models/Hydra/20 points
